name: annot8
description: Advertise on a trillion relevant website
overview:
annot8 allows you to advertise on a trillion relevant websites, earn money while you browse the web and raise funds for your favourite charities.

Within five minutes of registering at annot8.net, people and companies can build advertising campaigns that can be seen on a trillion relevant websites. And, with a minimum spend of Â£10 and a low rate of 3.5p per click, maximising brand awareness and product sales has never been so easy.

For small businesses, the pay-as-you-go model allows them to budget and control advertising spend, whilst larger companies can build rich and interactive advertisements targeting potential customers currently outside of their traditional reach.

By providing an alternative to Search Engine Optimisation, our User Centred Optimisation approach will allow us to provide the right content to the right people at the right time.

annot8 strongly believes in doing the right thing and therefore everyone who participates in the annot8 marketplace should benefit. We therefore share our advertising revenue with everyone involved in the process, including charities.
